title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 104.6 - Proceeds from sale of abandoned vehicle
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 104.6 - Proceeds from sale of abandoned vehicle

State Regulations

Any proceeds from the sale of an abandoned vehicle, less
any expenses incurred by the Thruway Authority, shall be held by the Thruway

Authority, without interest, for the benefit of the owner of such vehicle for a
period of one year. If not claimed within such one-year period such proceeds
shall be paid into the general fund of the Thruway Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
104.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
